author: Brendan Cole
title: Sean Hannity Says Areas Less Affected by Coronavirus Could Reopen Now, Businesses Must Not 'Wither on the Vine and Die'
description: The Fox News anchor said a rebound of the virus was inevitable but that Americans should get "safely back to work as soon as possible."
content:
Fox News anchor Sean Hannity has argued the areas of the U.S. least affected by the novel coronavirus should reopen straight away, expressing his fears that the shutdown was hurting the economy.
In his monologue on Wednesday, The Sean Hannity Show host said … [+2302 chars]
